mention.text: the Family Welfare Reform Act of 1987

reform '' when all Trojan does is expand existing welfare programs The bill 's questionable premise is that larger expenditures on welfare will reduce welfare dependency This thinking was nicely summarized by Rep. Anthony Beilenson , who said plainly
